ars_controle.target.set.block: Set target to block at %s in %s.
ars_controle.remote.error.different_dime: Target cannot be in different dimension.
ars_controle.page1.warping_spell_prism: The Warping Spell Prism allows you to warp a spell projectile to anywhere in the world, even across dimensions!
ars_controle.page1.scryers_linkage: The Scryer's Linkage links to another block, allowing machines to interact with its linked block from distance places. It is capable of linking items, liquids, energy, redstone, and a few other things. To configure it, use a Dominion Wand first on the block you want to link to, then on the linkage.
ars_controle.page1.remote: The Remote lets you remotely configure blocks and entities that the Dominion Wand can. To use it, first crouch and use it on the thing you would like to configure. Then, you can use it again on other blocks or entities depending on what the block you are configuring accepts.
ars_controle.page2.remote: When you are done, left clicking the air will clear its target. The remote allows for cross dimensional configuration of the Warping Spell Prism, unlike the Dominion Wand.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_precise_de: Delays the remainder of the spell by (2 ^ Extend Time Augments) ticks
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_abo: Only resolves the spell above the caster.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_bel: Only resolves the spell below the caster.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_lev: Only resolves the spell at the caster's elevation.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_or: Only resolves the spell if either of the next 2 Filters are true.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_xor: Only resolves the spell if only one of the next 2 Filters are true.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_xno: Only resolves the spell if the result of both the next 2 Filters are equal.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_not: Only resolves the spell if the result of the next Filter is false.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_ran: Has a base 50% chance of resolving. If amplified overall, chance will be (100% - 50% / (2 ^ Amplification)). If dampened overall, chance will be (50% / (2 ^ Dampening))
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.exists.bina: %s requires the next two glyphs to be Filters.
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.adding.bina: %s requires the next two glyphs to be Filters.
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.exists.bina: %s can not be part of another adaptive Filter.
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.adding.bina: %s can not be part of another adaptive Filter.
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.exists.unar: %s requires the next glyph to be a Filter.
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.adding.unar: %s requires the next glyph to be a Filter.
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.exists.unar: %s can not adapt another adaptive Filter.
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.adding.unar: %s can not adapt another adaptive Filter.
